titleStmt.title: A true narrative of God's gracious dealings with the soul of Shalome Ben Shalomoh of the circumcision after the flesh. As delivered to the Church of Christ assembled at their meeting-house, in Rosemary-Lane, September the 29th, 1699. With some additions made thereunto since; being taken from his mouth by the subscribers to the certificate annexed to the preface. Published for exalting the free grace of God.

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed : T.H. [i.e. Thomas Humfrey].
Caption title on p.1: The narrative of the conversion of Shalome Ben Shalomoh, the Jew, deliver'd unto the Church of Christ, to which Mr. Thomas Humfrey is pastor.
Narrative is in the form of a dialogue between Shalome ben Shalomoh and Thomas Humfrey, with added citations from the Bible.
Text on pp. 18-23 is printed at right angles to the page.
Reproduction of the original in the Dr. Williams' Library, London.
